query.value:
WITH VIP_OUT as
(
              select "/BIC/ZDISTID" as VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID, "/BIC/ZRSCUST" as VIP_CUSTOMER_ID, "/BIC/ZVPID" as VIP_ID
                from (
                        select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY ACC."/BIC/ZDISTID", ACC."/BIC/ZRSCUST"  ORDER BY "/BIC/ZTMSTMP" desc) as RN
                               ,* 
                          from SAPP30."/BIC/AZOTC_AO172" ACC
                         where "/BIC/ZDISTID" <> ''
                     ) t 
               where RN = 1
)
,
OUTDA as
(
              select "/BIC/ZDISTID" as VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID, "/BIC/ZRSCUST" as VIP_CUSTOMER_ID
                from (
                        select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY OUTDA."/BIC/ZDISTID", OUTDA."/BIC/ZRSCUST"  ORDER BY "/BIC/ZTMSTMP" desc) as RN
                               ,* 
                          from SAPP30."/BIC/AZOTC_AO152" OUTDA
                         where "/BIC/ZDISTID" <> ''
                     ) t 
               where RN = 1
)
,
VIP_ID as
(
     select OUTDA.VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID, OUTDA.VIP_CUSTOMER_ID, VIP_OUT.VIP_ID
       from OUTDA
  LEFT JOIN VIP_OUT
         ON OUTDA.VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID = VIP_OUT.VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID 
        AND OUTDA.VIP_CUSTOMER_ID = VIP_OUT.VIP_CUSTOMER_ID 
)
,
DIRECT as
(
       select ltrim("/BIC/ZMATERIAL", '0') as "/BIC/ZMATERIAL",UNIT,map(UOMN1D,0,0,1/UOMN1D) as CONVERSION,BASE_UOM --,UOMN1D as UOMN1D_OLD 
               --,*
      from SAPP30."/BIC/AUOMZMAT100" 
     where 1=1
       and UNIT='BOT' 
       and BASE_UOM='CS'
)
,
INDIRECT as
(
       select "/BIC/ZMATERIAL",UNIT,BASE_UOM,UOMN1D --,*
      from SAPP30."/BIC/AUOMZMAT100" 
     where 1=1
)
,
FILTER as
(
    select INDIRECT.* 
      from INDIRECT
 LEFT JOIN DIRECT
        ON DIRECT."/BIC/ZMATERIAL" = INDIRECT."/BIC/ZMATERIAL"
     WHERE DIRECT."/BIC/ZMATERIAL" IS NULL      
)
,
CS as
(
     select * from FILTER where UNIT = 'CS'
)
,
NO_CS as
(
     select "/BIC/ZMATERIAL",UNIT,BASE_UOM
            ,map(UOMN1D,0,0,1/UOMN1D) as UOMN1D 
       from FILTER where UNIT = 'BOT'
)
,
MAP_CONV as
(
     select ltrim(CS."/BIC/ZMATERIAL",'0') as "/BIC/ZMATERIAL",NO_CS.UNIT, NO_CS.UOMN1D*CS.UOMN1D as CONVERSION, CS.UNIT as BASE_UOM
       from CS
       JOIN NO_CS
         ON CS."/BIC/ZMATERIAL" = NO_CS."/BIC/ZMATERIAL"
      WHERE CS.BASE_UOM = NO_CS.BASE_UOM
)
,
CONVERSION as
(
select "/BIC/ZMATERIAL" as ZMATERIAL, UNIT, CONVERSION, BASE_UOM from DIRECT
UNION
select "/BIC/ZMATERIAL" as ZMATERIAL, UNIT, CONVERSION, BASE_UOM from MAP_CONV
)
,
RATIO as
(
select distinct "Item Id" ,"Product Brand Planning Size Id"
       ,CASE WHEN BOTTLES_PER_CASE_1 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE (CASE WHEN BOTTLES_PER_CASE_1 = 0 THEN 1 ELSE "Bottles per Case" / BOTTLES_PER_CASE_1 END) END as RATIO
from (
     select distinct MD."Item Id"
--            ,MD_1."Item Id" as ITEM_ID_1
            ,MD."Product Brand Planning Size Id"
            ,MD."Bottles per Case"
            ,MD_1."Bottles per Case" as BOTTLES_PER_CASE_1
       from DISTRIBUTORS_USA.NAMIBP_PRODUCT_MD MD
  LEFT JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.NAMIBP_PRODUCT_MD MD_1
         ON MD."Representative Planning IPC" = MD_1."Item Id"
    )
)
,
NINEL_CONVERTED as
(
select CASE_QTY*"Total Case Volume"/9 as NINEL_CASE_QTY, CASE_QTY
       ,to_decimal(DEPLETIONS * coalesce(RATIO,1),12,5) as DEPLETIONS 
       ,SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM as "SAP Customer Code"
       ,INVOICE_DT as "Invoice Date"
       ,DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM as "Distributor Code", SAP_MATERIAL_NUM as "Item Code"
       ,NET_UNIT_PRICE as "Net Unit Price"
       ,DISTRIBUTOR_MATERIAL_NUM as "Distributor Material Number"
       ,TRANSACTION_TYPE as "Transaction Type"
       ,DEPLETION_PERIOD as "Depletion Period"
       ,SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM||'|'||DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM as ACC_KEY
       ,CASE WHEN SOLD_QTY > 0 THEN DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM||'-'||"Product Brand Planning Size Id" ELSE '' END as "ConcatAccountAndPlanningSize", coalesce("Product Brand Planning Size Id",'') as PLAN_SIZE
       ,CASE WHEN SOLD_QTY > 0 THEN DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM||'-'||"Product Brand Size Id" ELSE '' END as "ConcatAccountAndBrandSize"
       ,SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM||'|'||DISTRIBUTOR_SALESREP_ID as SLSPRSN_KEY, "Total Case Volume"
       ,FIXED_FRONTLINE_UNIT_PRICE4, FIXED_ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT, FIXED_NET_UNIT_PRICE4, FIXED_SPLIT_CASE_UNIT_CHARGE
       ,to_decimal(CASE WHEN RATIO = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PRICE_TO_RETAIL/coalesce(RATIO,1)) END,9,2) as PRICE_TO_RETAIL, DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE, DEPLETIONS_EXPECTED_FLAG
       ,FREE_GOOD_FLAG ,VIP_ID ,CREATE_TS
  from (
     select CASE WHEN SOLD_QTY_UOM = 'B' THEN SOLD_QTY/PRO."Bottles per Case" ELSE SOLD_QTY END as CASE_QTY
            ,CASE WHEN SOLD_QTY_UOM = 'B' THEN (SOLD_QTY*CONVERSION.CONVERSION) ELSE SOLD_QTY END as DEPLETIONS
            ,FRONTLINE_UNIT_PRICE4 * SOLD_QTY as FIXED_FRONTLINE_UNIT_PRICE4
            ,ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT * SOLD_QTY as FIXED_ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT
            ,NET_UNIT_PRICE4 * SOLD_QTY as FIXED_NET_UNIT_PRICE4
            ,SPLIT_CASE_UNIT_CHARGE * SOLD_QTY as FIXED_SPLIT_CASE_UNIT_CHARGE
            ,CASE WHEN SOLD_QTY_UOM = 'B' THEN map(CONVERSION.CONVERSION,0,0,(NET_UNIT_PRICE - ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT)/CONVERSION.CONVERSION) ELSE NET_UNIT_PRICE - ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT END as PRICE_TO_RETAIL
            ,SLS.*, PRO."Total Case Volume", PRO."Product Brand Planning Size Id", PRO."Product Brand Size Id", RATIO.RATIO, ltrim(CUS."Current Customer Id",'0') as DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE, map(upper(CUS."Depletions Expected Flag"),'X','YES','NO') as DEPLETIONS_EXPECTED_FLAG, RAD_INCLUDE   
            ,IFNULL(VIP_ID.VIP_ID, SLS.DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM) as VIP_ID
       from DISTRIBUTORS_USA.DISTRIBUTOR_SALES SLS
  LEFT JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.NAMIBP_PRODUCT_MD PRO
         ON SLS.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM = PRO."Item Id"
        AND PRO."SAP Material Group Code" IN (100, 200, 300)
  LEFT JOIN RATIO
         ON SLS.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM = RATIO."Item Id"    
  LEFT JOIN VIP_ID
         ON SLS.SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM = VIP_ID.VIP_DISTRIBUTOR_ID 
        AND SLS.DISTRIBUTOR_CUSTOMER_NUM = VIP_ID.VIP_CUSTOMER_ID         
  LEFT JOIN CONVERSION
         ON SLS.SAP_MATERIAL_NUM = CONVERSION.ZMATERIAL 
  LEFT JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.NAMIBP_CUSTOMER_MD CUS
         ON SLS.SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM = CUS."Distributor Id"
--        AND upper(CUS."Depletions Expected Flag")=upper('X') 
       JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.CUSTOMER_INCLUDED INCL
         ON SLS.SAP_CUSTOMER_NUM = INCL.DISTRIBUTOR_ID
        AND INCL.RAD_INCLUDE = 'Yes'
       ) 
--   WHERE DEPLETION_PERIOD >= ADD_DAYS(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE,-7)),1)
  WHERE DEPLETION_PERIOD >= to_date( @{item().YEAR} ||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')
   AND DEPLETION_PERIOD < add_years(to_date(@{item().YEAR}||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd'),1)
)
,
FACT_AND_DEALS as
(
   select NIN.NINEL_CASE_QTY, NIN.CASE_QTY,NIN.DEPLETIONS, NIN."SAP Customer Code", NIN."Invoice Date", NIN."Distributor Code", NIN."Item Code"
          ,NIN."Net Unit Price", NIN."Distributor Material Number",NIN."Transaction Type",NIN."Depletion Period", NIN.ACC_KEY
          ,NIN."ConcatAccountAndPlanningSize", NIN."ConcatAccountAndBrandSize", NIN.SLSPRSN_KEY, NIN."Total Case Volume",NIN.FIXED_FRONTLINE_UNIT_PRICE4
          ,NIN.FIXED_ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT,NIN.FIXED_NET_UNIT_PRICE4,NIN.FIXED_SPLIT_CASE_UNIT_CHARGE,NIN.PRICE_TO_RETAIL,NIN.FREE_GOOD_FLAG,NIN.VIP_ID
          ,IFNULL(DLS."Deal (C8) ID", 'X')||'|'||IFNULL(DLS.MONTH,'X')||'|'||NIN.PLAN_SIZE||'|'||coalesce(NIN.DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE, 'X') as DEAL_KEY
		,DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE ,NIN.CREATE_TS, NIN.DEPLETIONS_EXPECTED_FLAG
     from NINEL_CONVERTED NIN     
LEFT JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.DEALS DLS
       ON NIN.DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE = DLS."Distributor (C7) Code"
      AND NIN.PLAN_SIZE = DLS."Brand Planning Size (P5) Code"
      AND to_char(NIN."Depletion Period", 'YYYYMM') = DLS.MONTH
      AND PRICE_TO_RETAIL >= DLS."Lower Bound" 
      AND PRICE_TO_RETAIL <= DLS."Upper Bound" 
--      limit 10
)
,   
LIM as 
(
  select CASE WHEN LATEST_MONTH >= 1 AND LATEST_MONTH <= 4 THEN to_date(LATEST_YEAR||'0430', 'yyyymmdd')
              WHEN LATEST_MONTH >= 5 AND LATEST_MONTH <= 12 THEN to_date(YEAR(ADD_YEARS(ALMOST_FILTER, 1))||'0430', 'yyyymmdd')
          END as FILTER_DATE from (
     select max(INVOICE_DT) as LATEST_DATE, to_int(to_char(max(INVOICE_DT), 'MM')) as LATEST_MONTH
            ,to_char(max(INVOICE_DT), 'YYYY') as LATEST_YEAR, NEXT_DAY(LAST_DAY(max(INVOICE_DT))) as ALMOST_FILTER 
       from DISTRIBUTORS_USA.DISTRIBUTOR_SALES  
    ) t
),
DATE as 
(
    select DATE_SQL,YEAR,MONTH,CALMONTH,CUS."Distributor Id" as DISTRIBUTOR_ID
      FROM _SYS_BI.M_TIME_DIMENSION as DimDate 
CROSS JOIN DISTRIBUTORS_USA.NAMIBP_CUSTOMER_MD CUS
     where DATE_SAP NOT IN ('00010101', '19000101', '99991231')
),
DATE_LIM as
(
     select DATE.*
       from DATE
       JOIN LIM
         ON DATE.DATE_SQL <= LIM.FILTER_DATE
--        AND DATE.DATE_SQL >= ADD_DAYS(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE,-7)),1)
       AND DATE.DATE_SQL >= to_date( @{item().YEAR} ||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')
	   AND DATE.DATE_SQL < add_years(to_date(@{item().YEAR}||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd'),1)  
),
GAPS as
(
   select --DATE_LIM.*
          to_number(0) as NINEL_CASE_QTY
          ,to_number(0) as CASE_QTY
          ,to_number(0) as DEPLETIONS
          ,DISTRIBUTOR_ID as "SAP Customer Code"
          ,DATE_LIM.DATE_SQL as "Invoice Date"
          ,MAX("Distributor Code") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "Distributor Code"          
          ,MAX("Item Code") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "Item Code"
          ,to_number(0) as "Net Unit Price"
          ,MAX("Distributor Material Number") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "Distributor Material Number"
          ,MAX("Transaction Type") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "Transaction Type"
          ,MAX("Depletion Period") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "Depletion Period"
          ,MAX(ACC_KEY) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as ACC_KEY
          ,MAX("ConcatAccountAndPlanningSize") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "ConcatAccountAndPlanningSize"
          ,MAX("ConcatAccountAndBrandSize") OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as "ConcatAccountAndBrandSize"
          ,SLSPRSN_KEY  -- KEPT INTENTIONALLY NULL (DUE TO THE LEFT JOIN), SO IT CAN BE FILTERED LATER
          ,to_number(0) as "Total Case Volume"
          ,to_number(0) as FIXED_FRONTLINE_UNIT_PRICE4
          ,to_number(0) as FIXED_ADDITIONAL_CHARGE_AMT
          ,to_number(0) as FIXED_NET_UNIT_PRICE4
          ,to_number(0) as FIXED_SPLIT_CASE_UNIT_CHARGE
          ,to_number(0) as PRICE_TO_RETAIL
          ,MAX(FREE_GOOD_FLAG) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as FREE_GOOD_FLAG
          ,MAX(VIP_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as VIP_ID
          ,MAX(DEAL_KEY) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as DEAL_KEY  
          ,MAX(DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as DISTRIBUTOR_C7_CODE
		,CURRENT_DATE AS CREATE_TS
		,MAX(DEPLETIONS_EXPECTED_FLAG) OVER (PARTITION BY DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID, DATE_LIM.CALMONTH) as DEPLETIONS_EXPECTED_FLAG	  
     from DATE_LIM
LEFT JOIN FACT_AND_DEALS FAD
       ON DATE_LIM.DATE_SQL = FAD."Invoice Date"
      AND DATE_LIM.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = FAD."SAP Customer Code"
--      limit 10
)
   SELECT * FROM GAPS WHERE SLSPRSN_KEY IS NULL AND "Depletion Period" IS NOT NULL
   UNION ALL
   SELECT * FROM FACT_AND_DEALS
--    WHERE  "Depletion Period" >= ADD_DAYS(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(CURRENT_DATE,-7)),1)
   WHERE "Depletion Period" >= to_date( @{item().YEAR} ||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')
	AND "Depletion Period" < add_years(to_date(@{item().YEAR}||'-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd'),1)
